oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Studies regarding production and use of organic medicinal and spice plants
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Basa, Adrian Gheorghe
Roman, Gheorghe Valentin
Ion, Viorel
Epure, Lenuta Iuliana
Toader, Maria
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Romania has tradition and a great potential to improve its production of medicinal and spice plants. Whether this important potential is used within the organic farming system, this will create new opportunities for small farmers. Medicinal and spice plants grown within the organic farming system could have a significant contribution to the following aspects: clean agriculture, new technologies, healthy products, environmental protection and conservation of the natural resources. In Romania, there are possibilities to produce and obtained organic medicinal and spice plants products.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Basa, Adrian Gheorghe; Roman, Gheorghe Valentin; Ion, Viorel; Epure, Lenuta Iuliana and Toader, Maria (2008) Studies regarding production and use of organic medicinal and spice plants. Bulletin UASVM, Agriculture , 65 (1), pp. 34-39.
